title: Inspiring
review: Inspiring story with and good adapted screenplay. Brad Pitt portrays a humble, determined and smart GM really well here! Love it.

title: Godsend!!
review: Now I need to rewatch everything! Love it! May Iron Man RIP. They wouldn't have won without him 💔 He truly lived up to the Avengers' value 🙏 Mad respect for his grit and Cap's resilience!!

title: Masterpiece
review: Deeply moving and motivating. Did not know about this story until I watched the movie. Glad that I did as I am writing on a computer. Peace.
